title: Someone Purchased a Champion that I was not planning to buy.
body: After logging in to my account I noticed that I have 1649 ip. I originally have 7994 so I looked at my purchased history and saw that I apparently owned Vel Koz now. I was trying to save up for name change so im kinda dissapointed. Is it possible to get a refund. PS This just happened 15 mins ago

replies.body:
Hi,

In your purchase history you should be able to hit "refund" beside the offending item (if you haven't already used up your refund allowance).

I'd also strongly suggest you change your password - how did someone have access to your account?

Mindstar
